entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
